comments.raw_text:
As seen in the Mar Mods addon (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/marmod/), which adds sub-menu items under the Addons item in the Firefox-menu. Each item corresponds to an addon that provides an options dialog, clicking on it will open that addon's options.

Screenshot: https://static-cdn.addons.mozilla.net/img/uploads/previews/full/59/59438.png?modified=1308573084
comments.creator: blair@theunfocused.net
